meanings.definition: The process of creating a unique name, symbol, or design that identifies and differentiates a product or service.
meanings.sent1: The branding of our new product will help customers recognize it easily.
meanings.sent2: Effective branding can make a product stand out among competitors.
meanings.sent3: The branding of the company's logo on the packaging made it look professional.
meanings.sent4: Her branding strategy was like a beacon in the crowded marketplace.
meanings.sent5: The branding of the logo on the billboard was eye-catching and memorable.

meanings.definition: The act of marking livestock with a branding iron to indicate ownership.
meanings.sent1: The rancher used branding to show which cattle belonged to him.
meanings.sent2: In the old days, branding was a common way to claim ownership of livestock.
meanings.sent3: The branding of the cows made them easily identifiable in the herd.
meanings.sent4: The branding iron sizzled as it marked the cattle with the ranch's symbol.
meanings.sent5: The branding on the cow's hide was a clear sign of ownership.

meanings.definition: The promotion of a particular product or company by means of advertising and distinctive design.
meanings.sent1: Successful branding can increase customer loyalty and recognition.
meanings.sent2: Branding plays a crucial role in building a strong brand image.
meanings.sent3: The branding of the new product was so catchy that it went viral.
meanings.sent4: Her branding campaign was like a symphony of colors and slogans.
meanings.sent5: The branding of the company's logo on the website was sleek and modern.
